text:
Hey <@U6NFPDBV1> what's the current status of Discord.jl? I saw this statement on the repo. Being new to Discord API, does that have enough functionality to write a bot yet?
>  This package is in the early stages. Currently, the full REST API is available, but the gateway interface has not been implemented.

elements.text: what's the current status of Discord.jl? I saw this statement on the repo. Being new to Discord API, does that have enough functionality to write a bot yet?
This package is in the early stages. Currently, the full REST API is available, but the gateway interface has not been implemented.

text: Most bots will want to use the gateway, it's how you do real-time stuff for any type of event. Alternatively if you just want to respond to message commands, there's a new "slash commands" interface that can use webhooks, and so my incomplete package will work well for that. I don't know if I'll ever get around to "finishing" that package, I don't feel very motivated tbh.

elements.text: Most bots will want to use the gateway, it's how you do real-time stuff for any type of event. Alternatively if you just want to respond to message commands, there's a new "slash commands" interface that can use webhooks, and so my incomplete package will work well for that. I don't know if I'll ever get around to "finishing" that package, I don't feel very motivated tbh.

text: Ah great. The Humans-of-Julia community is thinking about creating a game bot and I think it can work with just a command/response interface. So it sounds like that your package would work well.

elements.text: Ah great. The Humans-of-Julia community is thinking about creating a game bot and I think it can work with just a command/response interface. So it sounds like that your package would work well.

text: Once we use it, perhaps we can help you finish it when more people are motivated.

elements.text: Once we use it, perhaps we can help you finish it when more people are motivated.

text: Do you use Discord yourself BTW? You’re welcome to join our server.

elements.text: Do you use Discord yourself BTW? You’re welcome to join our server.
